priorityFindings.label: Critical Bottlebeck in followup
priorityFindings.why: Consistent reporting of friction ("scheduling") indicates systemic drag.

priorityFindings.label: Unaligned Growth Expectations
priorityFindings.why: Goals mentioning "dont" are unsupported by current resource availability.

executiveSummary: Strategic analysis for Cascade Climate Solutions indicates a primary focus on Operational Stabilization. Analysis of 7562 characters of stakeholder input reveals dominant patterns around "followup, calls, scheduling". While goals are set on calls, operational realities presented by owner suggest immediate remediation is required.
coreTensions: Tension between desired "Operational Stabilization" and reported friction around "followup".
Stakeholder owner reports "Scheduling and follow-up are t..." which conflicts with goal of calls.
impliedRisks: Risk of "Stalled Operational Stabilization" if owner's concern ("stop") is unaddressed.
Attrition risk due to high manual toil described by owner.
leveragePoints: Unlock Operational Stabilization by automating the "followup" workflow identified by stakeholders.
Resolve owner's constraint to accelerate calls.
